titleStmt.title: An end of doctrinal controversies which have lately troubled the churches by reconciling explication without much disputing. Written by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Salusbury at the Rising Sun in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Identified as B1258 on reel 200:22, and as B1258aA on reel 2561:19.
P. ii misnumbered as iv; p. 97-112 misnumbered as 85-100.
200:22 is a reproduction of original in British Library.
2561:19 is a reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
